contentList.content: Take only half the damage from Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing attacks. The duration of Blade Ward is reduced by 1 whenever the creature takes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage.
Has Resistance against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage. The duration of Blade Ward is reduced by 1 turn whenever Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage is taken.
